name: invoice-ninja
description: Invoice Ninja is an open source invoicing, billing and time tracking platform for freelancers and small businesses. It supports quotes, recurring invoices, payments, client portal and multi currency, with both self hosted and hosted editions.
features: Invoicing: Create professional invoices, Recurring billing, Quote management. Streamline your billing process.
Time Tracking: Log billable hours, Project tracking, Client timesheets. Track every minute.
Multi-Currency: Support global clients, Automatic conversion, Multiple payment methods. Work internationally.
Client Portal: Self-service access, Invoice viewing, Payment processing. Empower your clients.
Expense Tracking: Record business expenses, Receipt uploads, Categorization. Stay organized.
Reporting: Financial insights, Profit analysis, Tax reports. Make informed decisions.
Mobile Apps: iOS and Android support, On-the-go invoicing, Real-time sync. Work from anywhere.
Customization: Branded invoices, Custom fields, Template editor. Make it yours.
Payment Integration: Stripe, PayPal, and more, Automated reminders, Online payments. Get paid faster.
Self-Hosted: Complete data control, Privacy-first, No subscription fees. Own your business data.
